prompts: Create a slimy creature with vibrant colors and a mischievous grin for a new Pokemon.
Imagine a Pokemon that blends in with urban environments, featuring a colorful, gooey appearance.
Design a Pokemon with a gooey texture, using shades of purple and green to stand out.
Generate a creature that resembles sludge but has a playful personality and vivid colors.
Make a Pokemon that is both cute and a bit gross, showcasing a mix of pink and blue hues.
Show me a Pokemon that evolves from a toxic waste creature into a majestic form.
Give me a Pokemon that thrives in urban areas, with a colorful, slimy body and mischievous nature.
